mapper.insert: insert into resumes (user_id, education, experience, skills, preferred_location, salary_expectation, title, core_competency, desired_position, motivation, is_completed) values (#{userId}, #{education}, #{experience}, #{skills}, #{preferredLocation}, #{salaryExpectation}, #{title}, #{coreCompetency}, #{desiredPosition}, #{motivation}, #{isCompleted})
mapper.select: select id, title, updated_at as updatedAt, is_public as isPublic from resumes where user_id=#{userId} and deleted_at is null and is_completed=true and is_public=true
select id, title, updated_at as updatedAt, is_public as isPublic from resumes where user_id=#{userId} and deleted_at is null and is_completed=true and is_public=false order by updated_at desc
select id, title from resumes where user_id=#{userId} and deleted_at is null and is_completed=false order by updated_at desc
mapper.update: update resumes set is_public=true where id=#{resumeId} and deleted_at is null and is_completed=true
update resumes set is_public=false where user_id=#{userId} and is_public=true and deleted_at is null
mapper.select: select id, user_id as userId, education, experience, skills, preferred_location as preferredLocation, salary_expectation as salaryExpectation, create_at as createAt, is_public as isPublic, title, core_competency as coreCompetency, desired_position as desiredPosition, motivation, updated_at as updatedAt from resumes where id=#{resumeId} and deleted_at is null

select id, user_id as userId, education, experience, skills, preferred_location as preferredLocation, salary_expectation as salaryExpectation, title, core_competency as coreCompetency, desired_position as desiredPosition, motivation from resumes where id=#{resumeId} and deleted_at is null
mapper.update: update resumes set education=#{education}, experience=#{experience}, skills=#{skills}, is_completed=#{isCompleted}, preferred_location=#{preferredLocation}, salary_expectation=#{salaryExpectation}, is_public=#{isPublic}, title=#{title}, core_competency=#{coreCompetency}, desired_position=#{desiredPosition}, motivation=#{motivation} where id=#{id} and deleted_at is null and is_public=false
update resumes set deleted_at=now() where id=#{resumeId} and deleted_at is null
